item.title: mermaid
item.description: Directions 1 2 3 4 5 graph TD # top down graph TB # top to bottom graph BT # bottom to top graph LR # left to right graph RL # right to left Shapes 1 2 3 graph TD Box(Box with Rounded Edges) 1 2 3 graph TD Box[Box with Sharp Edges] 1 2 3 graph TD Box>Asymmetric Shape] 1 2 3 graph TD Box{Rhombus} 1 2 3 graph TD Box{{Hexagon Shaped Box}} 1 2 3 graph TD Box((Circle)) 1 2 3 graph TD Box([Pill Shaped Box]) 1 2 3 graph TD Box[(Cylindrical Shaped Box)] 1 2 3 graph TD Box[Subroutine Shaped Box](Subroutine Shaped Box) 1 2 3 4 5 graph TD Box1[/Parallelgram Shaped Box/] Box2[\Parallelgram Shaped Box\] 1 2 3 4 5 graph TD Box3[/Parallelgram Shaped Box\] Box4[\Parallelgram Shaped Box/] Links 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 graph TD A(Arrow Head) --> B A1(Open Link) --- B1 A3(Dotted Link) -.
